name: GunPlay (A."FireDragis" S., Kubos.cz, PepiCzech, SUZsounds)
description:
Kids playing with toys, is there something cuter? Especialy when they are dismembering teddy bears. By the way that is exactly what you will be doing in this game. So go and destroy those toys as a Sir Gunna.

Creators:

Kubos.cz: programming
Pepiczech: visuals
SUZsound : sound designA. "FireDragis" S.: animation, level design
Created for Brno Game Jam
